name: double
representation: (1, X2≔X1; while X2≠0 do X1≔X1+1; X2≔X2-1 od)

name: test
representation: (1, X2≔double(X1); while X2≠0 do X1≔X1+1; X2≔X2-1 od)

name: addition
representation: (2, while X2≠0 do X1≔X1+1; X2≔X2-1 od)

name: addition3
representation:
(3, X4:=X1; while X2 
ot = 00 do X4≔X4+1; X2≔X2-1 od; while X3 
ot = 0 do X4:=X4+1; X3=X3-1 od; X1:=X4)

name: product
representation: (2, X3≔X1; X1≔0; while X2≠0 do X1≔addition(X1,X3); X2≔X2-1 od)
